Uses of Class
com.google.android.apps.common.testing.ui.espresso.DataInteraction

  • Packages that use DataInteraction 
    Package Description
    com.google.android.apps.common.testing.ui.espresso  

    • Uses of DataInteraction in com.google.android.apps.common.testing.ui.espresso

      Methods in com.google.android.apps.common.testing.ui.espresso that return DataInteraction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataInteraction DataInteraction.atPosition(Integer atPosition)
      Selects the view which matches the nth position on the adapter based on the data matcher.
      DataInteraction DataInteraction.inAdapterView(org.hamcrest.Matcher<android.view.View> adapterMatcher)
      Selects a particular adapter view to operate on, by default we operate on any adapter view on the screen.
      DataInteraction DataInteraction.inRoot(org.hamcrest.Matcher<Root> rootMatcher)
      Causes this data interaction to work within the Root specified by the given root matcher.
      DataInteraction DataInteraction.onChildView(org.hamcrest.Matcher<android.view.View> childMatcher)
      Causes perform and check methods to take place on a specific child view of the view returned by Adapter.getView()
      static DataInteraction Espresso.onData(org.hamcrest.Matcher<Object> dataMatcher)
      Creates an DataInteraction for a data object displayed by the application.
      DataInteraction DataInteraction.usingAdapterViewProtocol(AdapterViewProtocol adapterViewProtocol)
      Use a different AdapterViewProtocol if the Adapter implementation does not satisfy the AdapterView contract like (@code ExpandableListView)
